scripts.start: concurrently -n "main,appA,appB" -c "gray.bgBlue,white.bgMagenta,white.bgGreen" "npm run start-main" "npm run start-a" "npm run start-b"
scripts.start-main: cd container-app && npm i && npm run start:dev
scripts.start-a: cd app-a && npm i && npm run start:lib
scripts.start-b: cd app-b && npm i && npm run start:lib
